evaluations.source: IVOTY (International Van of the Year) Committee
evaluations.opinion: PV5 demonstrated superior performance, efficient electric platform, and userâ€‘centric design, setting a new benchmark for practical innovation in the electric commercial vehicle market.

confirmed_facts: Kia PV5 was awarded the 2026 World Van of the Year at the Solutrans trade show in Lyon, France.
The award was decided by unanimous agreement of all 26 judges.
PV5 is the first Korean brand and the first Asian electric commercial vehicle to receive this award.
PV5 outperformed competitors such as Ford E-Transit Courier, Ford E-Transit, Volkswagen Crafter, and Paragon SV.
The award is presented by a nonâ€‘profit organization composed of commercial vehicle journalists from over 12 European countries.
Kia has won four consecutive global EV awards: 2023 EV6 GT (World Performance Car of the Year), 2024 EV9 (World Car of the Year & World Electric Car of the Year), 2025 EV3 (World Car of the Year).

timeline.event: PV5 presented and awarded the 2026 World Van of the Year at Solutrans in Lyon, France.
Kia announced the award victory to the public.
